short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make browser windows open with a consistent position and size

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** UPDATE June 2024: This extension is no longer under active development. ***

Window Seat makes browser windows open at a desired position and size.

You can also position a window or all windows with a single click.
